META_DEFAULT_TITLE: Citizen OS: una plataforma de toma de decisiones electrónica para comunidades.
META_DEFAULT_DESCRIPTION: Citizen OS facilita el debate participativo y la votación para grupos cuando reunirse en Internet o sin conexión al mismo tiempo no sea una opción.
META_DEFAULT_KEYWORDS: toma de decisiones electrónica, gobierno electrónico, democracia digital, democracia, democracia directa, democracia líquida
TXT_REPORT_TYPES_NULL: Seleccione un motivo de la denuncia
TXT_REPORT_TYPES_SPAM: Contiene spam o no está relacionado con el tema
TXT_REPORT_TYPES_NETIQUETTE: Infringe la etiqueta de la red

MODALS.GROUP_DELETE_CONFIRM_TXT_ARE_YOU_SURE: ¿Está seguro de que quiere eliminar este grupo?
MODALS.GROUP_DELETE_CONFIRM_TXT_LOSE_ACCESS: Todos los miembros del grupo perderán el acceso a los temas relacionados con este grupo.
MODALS.GROUP_MEMBER_TOPIC_DELETE_CONFIRM_TXT_AR: ¿Está seguro de que quiere quitar este tema?
MODALS.GROUP_MEMBER_USER_DELETE_CONFIRM_TXT_ARE: ¿Está seguro de que quiere quitar este usuario?
MODALS.GROUP_MEMBER_USER_LEAVE_CONFIRM_TXT_ARE_: ¿Está seguro de que quiere abandonar el grupo?
MODALS.TOPIC_CLOSE_CONFIRM_TXT_NO_UNDO: Tenga en cuenta que esta acción no se puede deshacer.
MODALS.TOPIC_CLOSE_CONFIRM_TXT_NO_EDIT: El tema se cerrará y ya no podrá editar sus contenidos.
MODALS.TOPIC_CLOSE_CONFIRM_TXT_NO_VOTE: La votación finalizará y no podrán realizarse más votaciones.
MODALS.TOPIC_CLOSE_CONFIRM_BTN_NO: NO, NO QUIERO CERRAR EL TEMA
MODALS.TOPIC_DELETE_CONFIRM_TXT_ARE_YOU_SURE: ¿Está seguro de que quiere eliminar el tema?
MODALS.TOPIC_DELETE_CONFIRM_TXT_TOPIC_DELETED: Se eliminarán todas las versiones del tema
MODALS.TOPIC_DELETE_CONFIRM_TXT_DISCUSSION_DELE: All discussions and votes will be deleted.
MODALS.TOPIC_DELETE_CONFIRM_TXT_TOPIC_REMOVED_F: The topic will be removed from groups and categories.
MODALS.TOPIC_MEMBER_GROUP_DELETE_CONFIRM_TXT_AR: Are you sure you want to remove this group?
MODALS.TOPIC_MEMBER_USER_LEAVE_CONFIRM_TXT_ARE_: Are you sure you want to leave this topic?
MODALS.TOPIC_COMMENT_REPORT_PLACEHOLDER_REPORT_: Explain why you find this comment inappropriate...

MODALS.TOPIC_COMMENT_MODERATE_TXT_ARE_YOU_SURE: Are you sure you want to moderate this comment? You cannot undo this action.
MODALS.TOPIC_DELETE_COMMENT_TXT_ARE_YOU_SURE: Are you sure you want to delete this argument? You cannot undo this action.
MODALS.TOPIC_DELETE_REPLY_TXT_ARE_YOU_SURE: Are you sure you want to delete this reply? You cannot undo this action.
MODALS.LOGIN_HEADING: Log in / Register to Citizen OS
MODALS.LOGIN_ESTEID_ERROR_PHONE: Invalid phone number. Please enter phone number with country code.
MODALS.LOGIN_ESTEID_TXT_CHECK_CONTROL_CODE: Make sure control code matches with one in the phone screen and enter Mobiil-ID PIN1.
MODALS.LOGIN_SMARTID_PLACEHOLDER_COUNTRY_CODE: Código de país de dos letras
MODALS.LOGIN_SMARTID_TXT_CHECK_CONTROL_CODE: Asegúrese de que el código de control coincida con un código de la pantalla del teléfono y escriba el código PIN1 de Smart-ID.

MODALS.TOPIC_ATTACHMENT_DELETE_CONFIRM_TXT_ARE_: ¿Está seguro de que quiere eliminar este adjunto?
MODALS.TOPIC_SETTINGS_LBL_MAKE_PRIVATE_EXT: SOLO PODRÁN UNIRSE AL TEMA LOS USUARIOS A LOS QUE INVITE
MODALS.TOPIC_SETTINGS_LBL_HASHTAG_EXT: USE ESTE HASHTAG EN LAS REDES SOCIALES Y LAS MENCIONES SE MOSTRARÁN DEBAJO DEL TEMA
MODALS.TOPIC_SETTINGS_LBL_LEAVE_TOPIC_EXT: AL ABANDONAR UN TEMA, RECHAZARÁ CUALQUIER DERECHO QUE PUEDA TENER COMO USUARIO EN ESE TEMA
MODALS.TOPIC_SETTINGS_LBL_DELETE_TOPIC_EXT: ELIMINAR UN TEMA ES UNA ACCIÓN QUE NO SE PUEDE DESHACER. CONFIRME QUE ESTÁ SEGURO DE SU DECISIÓN.
MODALS.TOPIC_SETTINGS_TXT_INVITE_USERS_AND_GROU: Invite a usuarios y grupos por nombre o dirección de correo electrónico
MODALS.TOPIC_SETTINGS_PLACEHOLDER_INVITE_USERS_: Buscar por nombre o dirección de correo electrónico
MODALS.TOPIC_SETTINGS_TXT_PRESS_ENTER_OR_CLICK_: Press enter or click to add
MODALS.TOPIC_SETTINGS_TXT_SHARE_LINK: Share this link to people you want to join the topic:

MODALS.GROUP_CREATE_SETTINGS_LBL_LEAVE_GROUP_EX: LEAVING A GROUP WILL RESULT IN GIVING UP ANY RIGHTS YOU MAY HAVE AS USER IN THAT GROUP
MODALS.GROUP_CREATE_SETTINGS_LBL_DELETE_GROUP_E: DELETING A GROUP CAN NOT BE UNDONE. BE SURE TO BE REALLY SURE ABOUT THIS.
MODALS.GROUP_CREATE_SETTINGS_LBL_INVITE_USERS: Invite users via their name or e-mail address
MODALS.GROUP_CREATE_SETTINGS_PLACEHOLDER_SEARCH: Search by username or e-mail address
MODALS.TOPIC_VOTE_DELEGATE_LBL_SEARCH_MEMBERS: You can delegate your vote only to other members of this topic. Search topic members by their name.

MODALS.TOPIC_EVENT_DELETE_CONFIRM_TXT_ARE_YOU_S: ¿Está seguro de que quiere eliminar esta actualización?

HOME.TXT_BEGINNERS_GUIDE: Hi there, welcome to Citizen OS! Read this topic to find out how everything works.

MY.HEADING_NOT_IN_GROUP: You are not yet part of a group.
MY.HEADING_AT_LEAST_WE_HELP: Como mínimo, aún podemos ayudarle si

PARTNERS_CONSENT.HEADING: Rahvaalgatus.ee would like to access following data from Your account:
PARTNERS_CONSENT.TXT_VIEW_PROFILE: View and edit Your Citizen OS profile - name, company, email, picture.
PARTNERS_CONSENT.TXT_VIEW_TOPICS: View and edit Your Citizen OS public Topics and Topics created via the Rahvaalgatus.ee website.
PARTNERS_CONSENT.TXT_VIEW_VOTES: View and edit Your Citizen OS Votes in public Topics and Topics created via the Rahvaalgatus.ee website.
PARTNERS_CONSENT.TXT_VIEW_GROUPS: View and edit Your Citizen OS Groups.
PARTNERS_CONSENT.TXT_POLICY: Rahvaalgatus.ee will use this information in accordance with their respective terms of service and privacy policies.

PARTNERS_LOGIN.HEADING: Rahvaalgatus.ee works together with Citizen OS to offer you a great experience. If you want to use the platform to its fullest, please login to Citizen OS or register.

TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_INFO_TXT_EDIT: You are now in edit mode. You can add text or make changes to it. All changes are automatically saved.
TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_INFO_TXT_VOTE: This topic is being voted on, editing is no longer possible!
TOPICS_TOPICID.ADD_MILESTONES_PLACEHOLDER_SUBJECT: How is the decision being put into practice?
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_HEADING_REQUIRE_HARD_ID: Para realizar este voto, se necesita una firma con tarjeta de identificación o Mobiil-ID.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_TXT_REQUIRE_HARD_ID: Para firmar y registrar este documento, se necesita una tarjeta de identificación o Mobiil-ID. Solo se puede votar después de identificarse.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_TXT_VOTE_REGISTERED: Gracias por su voto. Aún puede cambiar de opinión y votar por otra opción.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_TXT_VOTE_CLOSED: Todos han emitido sus votos. Puede descargar el documento completo aquí.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_HEADING_STEP1: Paso 1: Seleccionar el tipo de votación
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_HEADING_STEP3: Paso 3: Configurar los derechos de votación
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_LBL_AUTH_SOFT_ID: Inicio de sesión con red social
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_LBL_AUTH_SOFT_ID_EXPLANATION: SE NECESITA UN NOMBRE DE USUARIO DE CITIZEN OS
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_LBL_AUTH_HARD_ID_EXPLANATION: ES NECESARIO FIRMAR CON UNA TARJETA DE IDENTIFICACIÓN O DISPOSITIVO MÓVIL
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_LBL_DELEGATION_EXPLANATION: PERMITE A LOS USUARIOS TRANSFERIR SU DERECHO DE VOTO.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_LBL_NOTICE_DELEGATION_DISABLED_FOR_: Cuando EID es el método elegido de votación, la delegación no se permite.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_HEADING_STEP4: Paso 4: Fin del sistema de votación

MSG_ERROR_HWCRYPTO_USER_CANCEL: You have cancelled the log in flow.
MSG_ERROR_HWCRYPTO_NO_CERTIFICATES: No card in reader. Check if the ID-card is inserted correctly to the reader. New ID-cards have chip on the back side of the card.

MSG_ERROR_DELETE_API_USERS_GROUPS_MEMBER: You cannot leave this Group as you are the last admin user of this Group. Please assign a new admin to leave.
MSG_ERROR_DELETE_API_USERS_TOPICS_MEMBER: You cannot delete the last user with admin permissions. Assign a new admin to delete the user.
MSG_ERROR_PUT_API_USERS_TOPICS_MEMBERS_U: You cannot remove admin permissions from the last admin user. Please assign admin permissions to another user to change the permissions of the current one.
MSG_ERROR_40300: You don't have permissions to complete the operation.
MSG_ERROR_50000: Something went wrong in our system. We're very sorry! Please try one more time. If the error persists, please contact our customer support.
MSG_ERROR_NETWORK_PROBLEMS: Network issues, please check your internet connection.
